DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study assess effectiveness safety drug GSK189254 treating patient narcolepsy .
DOC.brief_title: Effectiveness Of The Drug GSK189254 In Treating Patients With Narcolepsy
DOC.criteria: Inclusion criterion : Narcolepsy patient Body mass index 18 32 kg/m2 Females may child bear nonchild bear potential . Agreement refrain drive operate heavy machinery duration study . Must able withdraw medication treatment daytime sleepiness must live . Exclusion criterion : History presence major psychiatric disorder depression . History significant head trauma previous 12 month . Participation clinical trial previous 3 month . Patient significant recent ( within 1 year ) history drug alcohol abuse . Patient pregnant breastfeeding .
